text.intro: I am a linguist specializing in Slavic languages, particularly Russian, Czech, and Polish.
text.methods: My research integrates a variety of methods, including corpus and computational linguistics as well as experimental techniques.
text.phd: I received my PhD in 2023 from the University of Cologne in the field of Slavic Linguistics, with a focus on identity-driven morphosyntactic variation of Russian and Czech nonbinary speakers.
text.work: I am a research fellow in the Key Profile Area “Skills and Structures in Language and Cognition” (SSLAC) and a research fellow in Slavic Linguistics at the Slavic Department, University of Cologne.
